name: risport-influx-exporter
description: Docker container to collect Cisco RisPort stats and export to InfluxDB.
author: Jeremy Worden <jeremy@automate.builders>

scripts.start: NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 NODE_ENV=production node main.js
scripts.development: NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 NODE_ENV=development node main.js
scripts.test: NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 NODE_ENV=test node main.js
scripts.staging: NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 NODE_ENV=staging node main.js
